comments.author: Mathieu
comments.content: I also feel that alternating projects is a good way to fight procrastination, especially if you alternate between projects with long time reward and immediate reward.

comments.author: b
comments.content:
It's as though procrastination is such a devastating problem, two enterprising programmers could team up to write an application - on Android, for example - that would allow them to budget their time and constantly remind them of what they should be doing, then provide feedback based on what they *actually* did. They would be able to track their improvements over time and gain a sense of accomplishment and better work habits.

This seems like a winning app!

;)
